definition: basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face/CL:個|个[ge4]
treasure bowl (mythology)/fig. source of wealth/cornucopia/gold mine
a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
Tarim Basin depression in southern Xinjiang

sentences.english: The hexagonal pot shown in this picture is painted with five-colors and was put to auction at Sotheby's in the Netherlands.
sentences.chinese: 画上五色彩的六角盆图片在荷兰的苏富比拍卖。

sentences.english: The flower plant has overgrown its support.
sentences.chinese: 盆养花长得极高，超出了支架。

sentences.english: Glass door, make icebox, wooden door.

sentences.chinese: 科林斯便渐渐取代了玫瑰花盆。

sentences.english: He consumed a large plateful of the very savory stew.
sentences.chinese: 他吃光了一大盆很可口的炖肉。

sentences.english: Place it between the Tent of Meeting and the altar, and put water in it.
sentences.chinese: 要将盆放在会幕和坛的中间，在盆里盛水。

sentences.english: She barked elbows and knees on the cold-water basin .
sentences.chinese: 她的双肘和双膝碰到冷水盆。

sentences.english: If the pot feels light, water until it appears at the drainage holes.
sentences.chinese: 如果盆很轻了，就浇透直到水从排水孔流出来。

sentences.english: In a horrid silence Mrs. Darling smelt the bowl.
sentences.chinese: 在可怕的沉寂中，达林太太闻了闻那只盆。

sentences.english: And defecation reflection on the introduction of fiber, also came from pots of offal.
sentences.chinese: 与排便反射有关的传入纤维，也由盆内脏神经传入。

sentences.english: He turned around. The light was coming from the Pensieve sitting on Snape's desk.
sentences.chinese: 他转过身，光来自石内普办公桌上的记忆盆。

sentences.english: He has tried coming at the feeder from every direction but without success.
sentences.chinese: 于是牠试著从各种角度去搆喂鸟盆，但都无法成功。

sentences.english: The artwork is made of 5 stones and a central basin with water.
sentences.chinese: 这件作品由5块石头和盛有水的金属盆组成。

sentences.english: And it is the geochemical basin model of the exogenic U deposit.
sentences.chinese: 这实际是一套外生铀矿床的“地球化学盆”模式。

sentences.english: Mix the starter, rye flour, 1 cup of bread flour and water in a mixing bowl.
sentences.chinese: 混合酵头，黑麦粉，1杯面包粉和水在搅拌盆。

sentences.english: He also made the basins and shovels and sprinkling bowls.
sentences.chinese: 户兰又造了盆，铲子，和盘子。

definition: to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
